import React,{useEffect,useRef}from'react';import'./Nav.css';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Nav(_ref){var handleCampaignType=_ref.handleCampaignType;var upcomingCampaignRef=useRef(null);var link='link';var clickedLink="clicked-link";useEffect(function(){upcomingCampaignRef.current.classList.add(clickedLink);},[]);var handleClick=function handleClick(e,val){e.preventDefault();handleCampaignType(val);//Change the classList of links
